me.normanmaurer.niosmtp
Interface SMTPClientFuture<E>

All Superinterfaces:
Future<E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSMTPClientFuture, ReadySMTPClientFuture, SMTPClientFutureImpl
public interface SMTPClientFuture<E>
extends Future<E>

A Future which allows to register SMTPClientFutureListener and also make it possible to access the contained objects in a blocking fashion.

Author:
Norman Maurer

Method Summary
 void addListener(SMTPClientFutureListener<E> listener)
          Add the SMTPClientFutureListener which will notified once the SMTPClientFuture is complete.
 E getNoWait()
          Try to get E without blocking.
 SMTPClientSession getSession()
          Return the SMTPClientSession which belongs to the SMTPClientFuture.
 void removeListener(SMTPClientFutureListener<E> listener)
          Remove the SMTPClientFutureListener
 
Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Future
cancel, get, get, isCancelled, isDone
 

Method Detail

getNoWait

E getNoWait()
Try to get E without blocking. So if the Future.isDone() returns false it will just return null

Returns:
result

getSession

SMTPClientSession getSession()
Return the SMTPClientSession which belongs to the SMTPClientFuture. This may return null in some cases

Returns:
session

addListener

void addListener(SMTPClientFutureListener<E> listener)
Add the SMTPClientFutureListener which will notified once the SMTPClientFuture is complete. If the SMTPClientFuture was already completed it will notify the SMTPClientFutureListener directly

Parameters:
listener -

removeListener

void removeListener(SMTPClientFutureListener<E> listener)
Remove the SMTPClientFutureListener

Parameters:
listener -
